extensionAttribute.description: Displays the list of compliance controls that failed.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh ###### # Original by Matt Woodruff @ Jamf # 18 Nov 2021 # Last modified 22 Apr 2022 by Jordan Burnette ###### # ###### # INSTRUCTIONS # This Jamf Extension Attribute is used in conjunction with the macOS Security Compliance project (mSCP) # https://github.com/usnistgov/macos_security # # Upload the following text into Jamf Pro Extension Attribute section. # # Used to gather the list of failed controls from the compliance audit. ######
baselineVersion=$(ls -l /Library/Preferences | /usr/bin/grep 'org.*.audit.plist' | /usr/bin/awk '{print $NF}') auditfile="/Library/Preferences/${baselineVersion}" /usr/bin/plutil -convert xml1 "${auditfile}"
if [[ $(/usr/bin/grep "finding" "${auditfile}" 2> /dev/null) ]] ; then result="$(/usr/bin/defaults read "${auditfile}" 2> /dev/null | /usr/bin/grep -B3 "finding = 1" | /usr/bin/grep "{" | /usr/bin/cut -d '"' -f2)" else result="" fi
/bin/echo "${result}"
